corner_floor_light_lamp_name: Corner Floor RGB Lamp with Remote Control – 1.2m
description_floor_rgb_lamp_short: Modern corner RGB floor lamp with remote control. Enhance your space with adjustable brightness, dynamic color changes, and music sync mode. Perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, or gaming setups.
description_floor_rgb_lamp_part_1: Elevate your home decor with this sleek, minimalist Corner RGB Floor Lamp. Standing at 1.2 meters, this stylish floor nightlight and spotlight combo is designed to fit perfectly into any corner, adding a vibrant touch to your space. With its remote control, you can effortlessly adjust brightness, sync settings, and switch between a full spectrum of RGB colors to suit your mood or ambiance.
description_floor_rgb_lamp_part_2: Crafted from durable metal in a chic black finish, this lamp features 90 energy-efficient LED bulbs, consuming just 30 watts of power. Its wired electric power source ensures consistent performance, while the remote switch offers convenience at your fingertips. Ideal for modern interiors, this lamp blends functionality and style seamlessly.
your_browser_does_not_support_video_tag: Your browser does not support the video tag.
confirmation_of_order: ✅ Delivery will be arranged to: <1>{{city}}</1>, facility <3>{{facility}}</3>
enter_correct_ukrainian_phone_number: Enter a valid Ukrainian phone number
name: Name
deliveryNovaPoshtaInfo: Delivery: <1>Cash on delivery</1> according to post's rates. Pay upon receipt.
brightness_regulation_description: Take full control of your lighting experience with the adjustable brightness feature. Whether you need a soft glow for a cozy evening or a vibrant shine to energize your space, this lamp lets you fine-tune the intensity with ease using the remote control. Perfect for any mood or occasion!
sync_with_music_description: Transform your space into a lively spectacle with the Music Sync feature! This lamp pulses and changes colors in rhythm with your favorite tunes, creating an immersive atmosphere for parties, gaming, or simply relaxing to music. Let the beat light up your room!
rgb_colors_from_remote_description: Unleash your creativity with RGB color control at your fingertips! Using the remote, effortlessly switch between a full spectrum of vibrant colors to match your mood, decor, or vibe. From calming blues to bold reds, customize your lighting with a single click.
stylish_design_description: Elevate your interior with a sleek, minimalist design that blends seamlessly into any space. This corner lamp’s elegant black finish and modern angular shape make it a chic statement piece, enhancing your decor while delivering stunning light effects.
terms_of_delivery: We operate exclusively via cash on delivery and payment upon receiving the product.
too_big_or_heavy_item_warning: The item you're ordering might be too big or heavy for some delivery points. If you can't find your location, please choose one from the available list.
your_patronymic_required_by_delivery_com: We need your patronymic to send package through the Ukrposhta company.
we_couldnt_retrieve_your_orders_details: It seems we couldn’t retrieve your order details. Please try again or contact support.
order_success_text: Thank you for your order! Your order number is #{{order}}.
order_success_note: We might contact you if there are any questions about delivery. Otherwise, expect a message from the delivery service with tracking details.

moon_projector_usb.name: 'Moonlight Glow' Projector
moon_projector_usb.short_description: Bring romance to your home with the adjustable 'Moonlight Glow' projector. This LED nightlight casts a mesmerizing moon projection on your walls, making it perfect for bedrooms, relaxation, or stunning photography sessions.
moon_projector_usb.description_part_1: The 'Moonlight Glow' Projector is a sleek LED nightlight with an adjustable design that lets you customize the perfect angle for projecting a moon pattern onto your walls or ceiling. With a 3W light source and USB Type-C charging, it’s user-friendly and energy-efficient. Its durable ABS casing ensures longevity, while the compact build makes it portable for any space. A projection range of 2-3 meters makes it ideal for small rooms, effortlessly creating a cozy ambiance.
moon_projector_usb.description_part_2: Turn your bedroom or living space into a romantic retreat with the 'Moonlight Glow' Projector. This device not only adds a touch of magic to your downtime but also serves as a stunning backdrop for photography or special occasions. Its versatility makes it perfect for home use, vacations, or even as decor in kids’ rooms. With its soft glow and calming moon projection, it’s an ideal way to unwind after a busy day.
moon_projector_usb.feature_1_d: Projects a beautiful, detailed view of the moon, creating a serene and dreamy atmosphere in your space.
moon_projector_usb.feature_2_d: Customize the light intensity to match your mood, from a gentle glow to a brighter lunar shine.
moon_projector_usb.feature_3_d: Easily powered via USB, offering portability and compatibility with various devices or adapters.
moon_projector_usb.feature_4_d: Sleek and stylish, this projector enhances any room’s decor while remaining unobtrusive.
